si.title: චීනය පාසල් නිල ඇඳුම් ලබා දී ඇත
body_lines: චීන රජය 2025 කට පාසල් නිල ඇඳුම් ලබා දී ඇති බව රජය පවසා තිබේ.

en.title: China has provided school uniforms
body_lines: The government has said that the Chinese government has provided school uniforms for 2025.

summary_lines: "China's government announced it will provide school uniforms for all students starting in 2025. This initiative aims to standardize education attire across the country."
